column5: We just set our pumps on the dock at 1.509 per litre....Fishing has been great the last few weeks.
Does anyone know what camps are charging for gas these days?
Evergreen Lodge was charging about $4.60 a gallon earlier this summer. They don't take a make up on their gas you pay what they pay
1.60 per litre is what I charge. I have to mark mine up from what I pay, because I have to barge it out 8 miles into the middle of LOTW's. I don't make money on gas. These prices suck!
That's not as bad as I thought it would be. I heard horror stories of more than twice that. Thanks for the info
Ear Falls area resort was about $6 a gallon last week.
Yep - $8.00 per gallon up north of Kenora.
Just got back from LacSeul and gas was $5.30 gallon at resort.... 3.79 at gas stations...

Rather-be-fishin, where did you stay that gas was so much cheaper? Ear Falls gas stations were 1.51 liter last week( approx. 4 liters per gallon, liter is more than a quart, I know) and that is what the resort charged for gas. Vermillion Bay gas stations were charging 1.41 per liter.
From what I have heard, $3.79/gallon would be way below the norm.
I wonder what Ken and Brenda are charging at Lac Seul Outposts? they barge gas uplake 40 miles!!!
